INTERACTION_CANNOT_GRANT_CAPITAL_IF_MOVE: Cannot give away the capital county after moving the capital
INTERACTION_REVOKE_BEFORE_DATE: Cannot revoke this granted title before §Y$DATE$§!
INTERACTION_GRANT_THEOCRACY_LIMITS: Cannot give theocracies more than one duchy or kingdom
depose_antipope_desc: This Casus Belli can be used to depose an antipope in another realm.
faction_antiking_desc: Members seek to restore Papal authority in [This.GetName] by installing §Y[From.GetBestName]§! on the throne, deposing any antipope and passing the Papal Investiture law.
faction_antiking_ultimatum_desc: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding the throne, the overthrow of antipopes and the institution of Papal Investiture. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
EVTDESC8200:
Your shameful backing of a false Pope must end now. The Holy Father has agreed that the throne of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] should pass to me so that the realm can be brought back into the true [From.Religion.GetName] fold. Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences. The righteous stand behind me!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC8201:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to relinquish the throne to me. Your valuable support in this conflict will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC8202: Under pressure from the papally sanctioned Antiking Faction, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to relinquish the throne.
EVTDESC8203:
Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and relinquish the throne. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
ANTIPOPE_CREATOR_MUST_BE_INDEPENDENT: §RYou must be independent to create an antipope§!
ca_culture_jewish_1_desc: This is where the elite infantry serving a Jewish ruler is trained. Special care is taken to equip the soldiers with the finest heavy armor that money can buy. This, combined with rigorous training and iron discipline, makes them an elite force to be truly feared.
convert_to_spouse_cathar_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_fraticelli_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_waldensian_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_lollard_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_bogomilist_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_nestorian_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_monothelite_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_iconoclast_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_zikri_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Can this Allah beat the Old Gods though?
convert_to_spouse_yazidi_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Can this Allah beat the Old Gods though?
convert_to_spouse_ibadi_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Can this Allah beat the Old Gods though?
convert_to_spouse_druze_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Can this Allah beat the Old Gods though?
convert_to_spouse_hurufi_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Can this Allah beat the Old Gods though?
convert_to_spouse_mazdaki_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Zoroaster was undoubtedly a wise prophet - perhaps life really is a struggle between good and evil?
convert_to_spouse_manichean_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Zoroaster was undoubtedly a wise prophet - perhaps life really is a struggle between good and evil?
convert_to_spouse_monophysite_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. This White Christ does not sound very warlike though...
convert_to_spouse_samaritan_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Perhaps these Children of Israel truly are God's chosen?
convert_to_spouse_karaite_desc: The pillow talk of a spouse or concubine can be very persuasive. Perhaps these Children of Israel truly are God's chosen?
narrow_flank_leader_desc: This character has mastered the craft of finding the perfect terrain for defensive battles.
TITLE_CANNOT_USURP_COUNTIES: Not possible to Usurp County Rank Titles!
EVTOPTC65155: What have I become? No more steak for me.
IRONMAN_MODE_CHECKSUM_DESC: The game data files have been altered in some way, disabling achievements in Ironman mode. Check so you don't have a mod loaded or verify your game files.
EVTDESC_SoA_561: The realm has benefitted from the vast network of contacts that [From.GetTitledName], your Jewish [Root.GetChancellorName], has fostered abroad. Somehow [From.GetSheHe] always manages to keep up to date on new customs and the latest diplomatic developments.
EVTDESC_SoA_563: [From.GetTitledName], your [Root.GetTreasurerName], has several contacts among the Radhanites. This Jewish merchant network supposedly stretches across the entirety of the known world, from Western Europe all the way to distant Cathay, and these contacts have been a great boon to the development of the realm's economy.
EVTDESC_SoA_565: Your [Root.GetSpymasterName], [From.GetTitledName], seems to have friends and informants inside every Jewish community in Europe. Messenger pigeons arrive at [From.GetHerHis] abode on a daily basis, often carrying vital intelligence from abroad about new weapons and tactics.
LOADING_TIP_53: Jewish councillors will sometimes benefit the advancement of technology.
cathar_DESC: The Cathar, or Albigensian, heresy rejects confession and the holiness of the clergy and of the Pope. They only have a single sacrament - the Consolation - to remove sin and turn the believer into a Cathar 'Perfect'.  Defining features in-game:\n§Y*§! There is no religious head\n§Y*§! Cathars may install women as priests
fraticelli_DESC:
The Fraticelli, or 'Little Brethren', is a Catholic heresy that originated in the Fransiscan Order of monks. It is devoted to poverty and asceticism - especially for men of the cloth. Fraticelli heretics are violently opposed to Church wealth and displays of opulence. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Can create the Fraticelli Papacy, if Rome is conquered
§Y*§! The Pope can grant divorces
§Y*§! The Pope can grant the Invasion Casus Belli
§Y*§! The Pope can Excommunicate Fraticelli characters§Y*§! Fraticelli Bishops may pay tax to the Pope rather than their secular liege
bogomilist_DESC: Bogomilism is an originally Orthodox Christian heresy with Gnostic elements that completely rejects the ecclesiastical hierarchy and advocates a return to early Christianity. Bogomilists believe that the world was created by an evil demiurge - the Devil. Defining features in-game:\n§Y*§! There is no religious head\n§Y*§! Bogomilists may install women as priests
iconoclast_DESC:
The Iconoclast heresy plagued the Byzantine Empire in multiple waves. Iconoclasts believe that religious images - icons and depictions of holy figures in particular - are a form of idolatry and must not be allowed. In their heyday, iconoclasts destroyed innumerable such decorations and icons, sometimes even urged on by Iconoclast Emperors. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Can create the Iconoclast Patriarch if Constantinople is controlled
§Y*§! Multiple Patriarchs - the five Pentarchs and Autocephalous Patriarchs under Kings
§Y*§! Patriarchs can grant divorces
§Y*§! The Iconoclast Patriarch can grant the Invasion Casus Belli
§Y*§! Patriarchs can Excommunicate Orthodox characters
yazidi_DESC:
The Yazidi religion is properly a distinct religion but is treated as a Sunni heresy in the game. Yazidis believe that God created the world and left seven angels in charge, the chief of whom is the Peacock Angel, Malek Taus or Shaytan, a being usually identified by Christians and Muslims as Satan. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! The Yazidi Sheikhdom is held by a secular ruler, and can cease to exist.
§Y*§! The Yazidi Sheikh can subjugate other Yazidi rulers freely
§Y*§! The Yazidi Sheikh can declare great Jihads
§Y*§! Yazidi rulers can - and are expected to have - multiple wives
§Y*§! Temple Holdings can be held by anyone without penalty
§Y*§! Yazidi dynasties grow decadent unless the men have enough land and win wars
ibadi_DESC:
Ibadism is distinct from both Shi'a and Sunni Islam. Ibadis believe that souls condemned to Hell will stay there forever. Ibadis also reject the notion that Muslims will get to see Allah on the Day of Judgment. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! The Ibadi Caliphate is held by a secular ruler, and can cease to exist.
§Y*§! The Ibadi Caliph can subjugate other Ibadi rulers freely
§Y*§! The Ibadi Caliph can declare great Jihads
§Y*§! Ibadi rulers can - and are expected to have - multiple wives
§Y*§! Temple Holdings can be held by anyone without penalty
§Y*§! Ibadi dynasties grow decadent unless the men have enough land and win wars
hurufi_DESC:
The Hurufi faith is a mystical, kabbalistic, Sufi sect within Islam, regarded as a heresy. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! The Hurufi Sheikhdom is held by a secular ruler, and can cease to exist.
§Y*§! The Hurufi Sheikh can subjugate other Hurufi rulers freely
§Y*§! The Hurufi Sheikh can declare great Jihads
§Y*§! Hurufi rulers can - and are expected to have - multiple wives
§Y*§! Mosque Holdings can be held by anyone without penalty
§Y*§! Hurufi dynasties grow decadent unless the men have enough land and win wars
karaite_DESC: Karaite Judaism is a Jewish movement characterized by the recognition of the Tanakh alone as its supreme legal authority in Jewish religious law and theology. In this it is distinct from mainstream Rabbinic Judaism. Karaites maintain that all of the divine commandments handed down to Moses by God were recorded in the written Torah, without additional Oral Law or explanation. In-game, Karaite Judaism is a heresy of mainstream Judaism. This heresy has no formal head and no special game mechanics.
samaritan_DESC: Samaritanism is an Abrahamic religion closely related to Judaism. Samaritans assert their worship is the true religion of the ancient Israelites prior to the Babylonian Exile, preserved by those who remained in the Land of Israel, as opposed to Judaism, which they assert is a related but altered and amended religion. In-game, Samaritanism is treated as a heresy of mainstream Judaism. This heresy has no formal head and no special game mechanics.
expected_next_title_fraticelli_cardinal_: This bishop is probably next in line for a Cardinalship when one becomes available.
best_candidate_title_fraticelli_cardinal: Of all the bishops in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Cardinal by the Pope.
create_ibadi_caliphate_desc: Create the Ibadi Caliphate and assume your position as spiritual leader of all true Ibadi Muslims.
